content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I was previously commanded to browse two websites for information on customs and traditions of different countries. The first website did not provide useful information, and the second website returned an error message stating that the sentence was too long in the webpage. I was then commanded to use Google to find information on customs and traditions of different countries, which returned a list of links. The latest development involves receiving a command to search for websites that discuss customs and traditions of different countries by region using Google, which returned a new list of links. I was then commanded to browse one of the links, the website for the US Foreign Service Institute, with the same question.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information about customs and traditions of different countries. It describes the Foreign Service Institute and its various schools and resources for U.S. government foreign affairs professionals, as well as the Transition Center for employees and family members preparing for or returning from overseas assignments. \n \n Links: ['Skip to content (https://www.state.gov/bureaus-offices/under-secretary-for-management/foreign-service-institute/#content)', 'Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/statedept)', 'Twitter (https://twitter.com/StateDept)', 'Instagram (https://www.instagram.com/statedept/)', 'YouTube (https://www.youtube.com/user/statevideo)']"}]
"""
